description: A rich and decadent drink that combines the bold flavors of coffee, chocolate, and liqueur with a hint of sweetness.
ingredients: [{"name": "hot strong coffee", "units": "fluid ounces", "amount": 3}, {"name": "coffee-flavored liqueur", "units": "fluid ounce", "amount": 1}, {"name": "vodka", "units": "fluid ounce", "amount": 1}, {"name": "half-and-half", "units": "fluid ounce", "amount": 1}, {"name": "chocolate truffle", "units": "round", "amount": 1}]
instructions: Fill a heat-safe glass mug with boiling water. Let it stand for a few minutes to warm the mug. Discard the water. Add coffee, coffee liqueur, and vodka to the mug. Stir gently to combine. Drizzle half-and-half over the drink. Place the chocolate truffle on a spoon or thread onto a decorative pick and balance it on the glass rim. Just before drinking, tip the truffle into the drink.
notes: To make the drink even more decadent, add a splash of whipped cream or a sprinkle of cocoa powder on top. For an extra layer of flavor, use a flavored coffee liqueur like Kahlua or Tia Maria. Consider using a higher-quality chocolate truffle for an intense chocolate experience.
